issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
For the last several days I have been unable to send Push notifications from the Dashboard, nor have when I have tried to post a Push Notification has the notification even made it to the log files.

The iOS push certificates are all valid and push was working up until the 8th of April

There is nothing in the log files at all to look at even when it seems that the push has been saved and entered
fields.summary: Push Notification from Dashboard are not sending and no Push Notification Logs are being entered
